articles.title: Massive 8.8 Magnitude Earthquake Off Russia Triggers Pacific-Wide Tsunami Alerts
articles.description: An 8.8 magnitude earthquake, one of the most powerful ever recorded, struck off the coast of Russia's Far East, generating tsunami waves. The event prompted tsunami warnings and evacuations in coastal areas across the Pacific, including Japan, Hawaii, and the U.S. West Coast. Tsunami warnings were later downgraded for Hawaii as the situation was assessed.
